title: Book Review: ‘Just Passing Through,’ edited by Cullen Murphy
description: “Just Passing Through” collects the diaries and photographs of Milton Gendel, who lived large, bought plenty and schmoozed with the glamorous.
dc:creator: Alexandra Jacobs
category: Just Passing Through: A Seven-Decade Roman Holiday: The Diaries and Photographs of Milton Gendel (Book)
